t: About Peacock Alley - Luxury Bedding & Bath Essentials
s: Achieving the unthinkable in the face of adversity, Peacock Alley founder, Mary Ella Gabler, established the luxury linen market in the United States; all thanks to a little boudoir pillow. Since 1973, the mission for her family-run company has not changed.

Peacock Alley is a luxury bedding and home décor brand, renowned for its timeless designs and superior quality. From sumptuous sheets to cozy throws, Peacock Alley offers a range of products to create a beautiful and inviting home.
